name: Hotel Pelikan

reviews.text: I traveled to Aleksandrow with my parents. I wanted somewhere comfortable and clean, as my parents (although hardy) aren't young anymore. My Australian parents had no issues as all the staff made an effort to converse in English. This was refreshing.
reviews.title: Service, Quality and Cleanliness

description: Located just 300 metres from the centre of Aleksandrów Łódzki, the Pelikan offers a sauna, small gym and free Wi-Fi. Its rooms come with an LCD TV with satellite channels.Every morning a buffet breakfast is served at the on-site restaurant, which specialises in Polish and international dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar with a fireplace.All rooms at the Pelikan come with a working space and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. Some offer a seating area.Free on-site parking is provided.
